column4: having trouble with my 7.04.. i don't have any wireless card.. intel p4 core duo 1.86GHz, GeFORCE fx5200, 256MB memory, Asrock Board. im having BUG: soft lock on CPU#0 <<cant seem to boot
what mobo?
its an asrock motherboard
any idea?
try unplugging all the ide drives and see if it will boot
i mean, all but one cd drive
so you can boot to a livecd
how will i then install it?
if it ever boot
im having a problem right now with an asus motherboard not being able to boot into linux with more than one device on an ide cable at a time
your problem might be related
can you boot at all?
i can boot winxp though...
cant seem to pass after the splash screen
have you tried it in a recovery boot?
if not, do so and see where it dies
ok .. i will be back then.. can i still contact you if i ever have some advancements? email addy i mean
or you just thrive here?
im on here enough
if you find anything, let me know
thanks man..
np
